solution_line_template: The total ratio representing the stationery that Arlo has to buy for his school supplies is {books_ratio_part}+{pens_ratio_part} = <<{books_ratio_part}+{pens_ratio_part}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts}

The fraction representing the number of books that Arlo bought is {books_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}, and since he bought a total of {total_stationery} books and pens, he bought {books_ratio_fraction}*{total_stationery} = <<{books_ratio_fraction}*{total_stationery}={books_bought}>>{books_bought} books.
